review.title: “Negative Senior Management”
review.pros: Pros – Flexible hours and independent work environment.
review.cons: Cons – The lack of integrity, negative atmosphere, no pay raise in 10+ years.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop being so negative and leave the know-it-all-attitude behind.

review.title: “Passive-Aggressive Management without Ethics”
review.pros: Pros – Management works independently, and expects everyone to do the same
review.cons: Cons – Management has a smug superiority complex, a clear and well-defined lack of ethics, passive-aggressive qualities, and an unrealistic sense of their own importance with no desire to run a business in this century.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Ask yourself why most of your best employees have left the company and the remaining ones walk around like they are half dead?
